        required: false

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  release:
    name: Build & Release
    runs-on: macos-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Show Swift version
        run: swift --version

      - name: Extract version
        id: version
        run: |
          if [ "${{ github.event_name }}" = "workflow_dispatch" ] && [ -n "${{ inputs.version }}" ]; then
            VERSION="${{ inputs.version }}"
          else
            VERSION="${GITHUB_REF_NAME#v}"
          fi
          echo "VERSION=$VERSION" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
          echo "Building version: $VERSION"

      - name: Update Info.plist version
        run: |
          VERSION="${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          sed -i '' "s/<string>1.0.0</<string>$VERSION</g" Supporting/Info.plist
          sed -i '' "s/<string>1.0</<string>$VERSION</g" Supporting/Info.plist
          sed -i '' "s/VERSION=.*/VERSION=\"$VERSION\"/" Supporting/mdpreview || true

      - name: Update CLI version
        run: |
          VERSION="${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          sed -i '' "s/VERSION=\".*\"/VERSION=\"$VERSION\"/" Supporting/mdpreview

      - name: Build release (arm64)
        run: swift build -c release --arch arm64

      - name: Build release (x86_64)
        run: swift build -c release --arch x86_64

      - name: Create app bundle
        run: |
          VERSION="${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          BUILD_DIR_ARM=$(swift build -c release --arch arm64 --show-bin-path)
          BUILD_DIR_X86=$(swift build -c release --arch x86_64 --show-bin-path)

          mkdir -p build/MDPreview.app/Contents/MacOS
          mkdir -p build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources

          # Create universal binary
          lipo -create \
            "$BUILD_DIR_ARM/MDPreview" \
            "$BUILD_DIR_X86/MDPreview" \
            -output build/MDPreview.app/Contents/MacOS/MDPreview

          cp Supporting/Info.plist build/MDPreview.app/Contents/
          cp Supporting/MDPreview.entitlements build/MDPreview.app/Contents/
          cp Supporting/mdpreview build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources/mdpreview
          chmod +x build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources/mdpreview

          if [ -f "Assets/AppIcon.icns" ]; then
            cp Assets/AppIcon.icns build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources/AppIcon.icns
          fi

          # Copy resource bundles
          for bundle in "$BUILD_DIR_ARM"/*.bundle; do
            [ -d "$bundle" ] && cp -R "$bundle" build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources/
          done

          # Verify architecture
          echo "Binary architecture:"
          lipo -info build/MDPreview.app/Contents/MacOS/MDPreview

      - name: Install Apple certificate
        if: env.DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64 != ''
        env:
          DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64: ${{ secrets.DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64 }}
          DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_PASSWORD }}
          KEYCHAIN_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.KEYCHAIN_PASSWORD }}
        run: |
          # Create temporary keychain
          KEYCHAIN_PATH=$RUNNER_TEMP/app-signing.keychain-db
          security create-keychain -p "$KEYCHAIN_PASSWORD" $KEYCHAIN_PATH
          security set-keychain-settings -lut 21600 $KEYCHAIN_PATH
          security unlock-keychain -p "$KEYCHAIN_PASSWORD" $KEYCHAIN_PATH

          # Import certificate
          CERT_PATH=$RUNNER_TEMP/certificate.p12
          echo -n "$DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64" | base64 --decode -o $CERT_PATH
          security import $CERT_PATH -P "$DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_PASSWORD" -A -t cert -f pkcs12 -k $KEYCHAIN_PATH
          security list-keychain -d user -s $KEYCHAIN_PATH

      - name: Code sign (with Developer ID)
        if: env.DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64 != ''
        env:
          DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64: ${{ secrets.DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64 }}
          SIGNING_IDENTITY: ${{ secrets.SIGNING_IDENTITY }}
        run: |
          # Sign with entitlements
          codesign --force --deep --sign "$SIGNING_IDENTITY" \
            --entitlements Supporting/MDPreview.entitlements \
            --options runtime \
            --timestamp \
            build/MDPreview.app

          codesign --verify --verbose build/MDPreview.app

      - name: Code sign (ad-hoc fallback)
        if: env.DEVELOPER_ID_CERT_BASE64 == ''
        run: |
          # Ad-hoc sign for local testing (not notarized)
          codesign --force --deep --sign - \
            --entitlements Supporting/MDPreview.entitlements \
            build/MDPreview.app

          codesign --verify --verbose build/MDPreview.app

      - name: Verify dependencies
        run: |
          echo "=== Dynamic Libraries ==="
          otool -L build/MDPreview.app/Contents/MacOS/MDPreview
          echo ""
          echo "=== Bundle Size ==="
          du -sh build/MDPreview.app

      - name: Create DMG
        run: |
          VERSION="${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          DMG_NAME="MDPreview-$VERSION.dmg"
          mkdir -p dmg-staging
          cp -R build/MDPreview.app dmg-staging/
          ln -s /Applications dmg-staging/Applications
          hdiutil create -volname "MDPreview" \
            -srcfolder dmg-staging \
            -ov -format UDZO \
            "build/$DMG_NAME"
          rm -rf dmg-staging
          echo "DMG_NAME=$DMG_NAME" >> "$GITHUB_ENV"

      - name: Notarize DMG
        if: env.APPLE_ID != ''
        env:
          APPLE_ID: ${{ secrets.APPLE_ID }}
          APPLE_TEAM_ID: ${{ secrets.APPLE_TEAM_ID }}
          APPLE_APP_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.APPLE_APP_PASSWORD }}
        run: |
          # Submit for notarization
          xcrun notarytool submit "build/${{ env.DMG_NAME }}" \
            --apple-id "$APPLE_ID" \
            --team-id "$APPLE_TEAM_ID" \
            --password "$APPLE_APP_PASSWORD" \
            --wait

          # Staple the notarization
          xcrun stapler staple "build/${{ env.DMG_NAME }}"

          echo "Notarization complete!"

      - name: Create ZIP
        run: |
          VERSION="${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          ZIP_NAME="MDPreview-$VERSION.zip"
          cd build
          ditto -c -k --sequesterRsrc --keepParent MDPreview.app "$ZIP_NAME"
          cd ..
          echo "ZIP_NAME=$ZIP_NAME" >> "$GITHUB_ENV"

      - name: Calculate checksums
        run: |
          VERSION="${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          cd build
          shasum -a 256 "${DMG_NAME}" "${ZIP_NAME}" > "MDPreview-$VERSION-checksums.txt"
          cat "MDPreview-$VERSION-checksums.txt"
          echo "CHECKSUM_NAME=MDPreview-$VERSION-checksums.txt" >> "$GITHUB_ENV"

      - name: Create GitHub Release
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
        with:
          draft: false
          prerelease: ${{ contains(github.ref_name, '-') }}
          generate_release_notes: true
          files: |
            build/${{ env.DMG_NAME }}
            build/${{ env.ZIP_NAME }}
            build/${{ env.CHECKSUM_NAME }}
            build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources/mdpreview

      - name: Cleanup keychain
        if: always()
        run: |
          KEYCHAIN_PATH=$RUNNER_TEMP/app-signing.keychain-db
          if [ -f "$KEYCHAIN_PATH" ]; then
            security delete-keychain $KEYCHAIN_PATH || true
          fi

      - name: Commit version updates
        if: github.event_name == 'push'
        run: |
          git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
          git config user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
          git add Supporting/Info.plist Supporting/mdpreview || true
          git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m "chore: Update version to ${{ steps.version.outputs.VERSION }}"
          git push origin HEAD:main || true

content.thinking:
OK, so the Makefile has a `release` target that:
1. Builds the bundle (via `dmg` -> `bundle` -> `build`)
2. Signs with Developer ID
3. Notarizes

But the issue is:
1. The `bundle` target does `codesign --force --sign -` (ad-hoc), then the `release` target re-signs with Developer ID
2. The `release` target builds DMG first, then re-signs (which is wrong order - should sign first, then DMG)

Wait, looking more carefully:
- `release: dmg` depends on `dmg`


- `dmg: bundle` depends on `bundle`
- `bundle: build` depends on `build`

So the flow is: build -> bundle (ad-hoc sign) -> dmg -> release (Developer ID sign + notarize). The problem is that `release` signs the `.app` after the DMG is already created, so the DMG contains the ad-hoc signed version, not the Developer ID signed one.

The correct sequence should be: build, bundle, Developer ID sign, create DMG, sign the DMG itself, notarize, then staple. I need to restructure the Makefile to follow this order instead of signing after DMG creation.

Let me just execute the release steps manually to ensure they're done correctly, starting with checking if I have the notarization credentials available.

content.text: Makefileの`release`ターゲットは署名順序に問題があるので（DMG作成後にapp署名している）、手動で正しい順序でリリースします。まずテスト実行とビルドから。

content.text: GitHub Releaseを作成します。まずタグを打ちます。

input.command: git tag -a v1.3.0 -m "v1.3.0 - Fix per-tab scroll position and other bugs" && git push origin v1.3.0

content.content:
To https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview.git

toolUseResult.stdout:
To https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview.git

input.command:
gh release create v1.3.0 \
  build/MDPreview-1.3.0.dmg \
  build/MDPreview-1.3.0.zip \
  build/MDPreview-1.3.0-checksums.txt \
  build/MDPreview.app/Contents/Resources/mdpreview \
  --title "v1.3.0 - Fix per-tab scroll position and other bugs" \
  --notes "$(cat <<'EOF'
## What's New

### Bug Fixes
- **Fix scroll position shared between tabs** — Switching tabs now resets scroll to top instead of carrying over the previous tab's scroll position
- **Fix blank content on short files** — Files shorter than the scroll position of the previous tab are now displayed correctly
- **Fix template reload state** — `isLoaded` state is properly reset when the template reloads, preventing stale content
- **Fix race condition for large files** — Async loading of files >1MB now correctly guards against tab switches during load
- **Fix TOC code block false positives** — Headings inside fenced code blocks (``` or ~~~) are no longer extracted into the Table of Contents

### Previous fixes (from v1.2.9, unreleased)
- Remove App Sandbox to fix file access in signed builds (Homebrew installs)
- Fix WKWebView resource loading scope
- Fix log export file overwrite handling
- Scale up app icon to better fill macOS squircle mask

### Release Info
- Universal binary (arm64 + x86_64)
- Signed with Developer ID (Takami Kazuihro)
- Notarized by Apple

## Install

```bash
brew install --cask kazu-42/tap/mdpreview
```

Or download the DMG from the assets below.

**SHA-256 Checksums:**
```
e87827d6976fd5a075b1ea24c27ebbec957b60645c94b39e1cfa36938959375b  MDPreview-1.3.0.dmg
b9e55191e3f784ed8daa428c72ef8a519cb8d2dec0dff4b9a7ffcafa458374b0  MDPreview-1.3.0.zip
```
EOF
)"

input.content:
# MDPreview Project Memory

## Project Overview
- macOS Markdown preview app built with Swift/SwiftUI + WKWebView
- SPM (Swift Package Manager) based, not Xcode project
- Distributed via Homebrew Cask (`kazu-42/tap/mdpreview`)

## Key Files
- `Sources/MDPreviewCore/` - Core library (MarkdownWebView, Workspace, MainView, Logger, etc.)
- `Sources/MDPreview/` - App entry point
- `Supporting/Info.plist` - App metadata and version
- `Supporting/mdpreview` - CLI shell script
- `Supporting/MDPreview.entitlements` - Hardened Runtime only (no App Sandbox)
- `Assets/AppIcon.icns` - App icon
- `Makefile` - Build/bundle/release targets
- `.github/workflows/release.yml` - CI release pipeline

## Release Process
1. Update version in `Supporting/Info.plist` and `Supporting/mdpreview`
2. Commit and push to main
3. Build universal binary: `swift build -c release --arch arm64` + `--arch x86_64`
4. Create app bundle with `lipo` universal binary
5. Sign: `codesign --sign "Developer ID Application: Takami Kazuihro (6RQMKB9NL7)" --entitlements Supporting/MDPreview.entitlements --options runtime --timestamp`
6. Create DMG with signed app
7. Notarize: `xcrun notarytool submit` + `xcrun stapler staple`
8. Create GitHub release with DMG, ZIP, checksums, CLI
9. Update Homebrew tap: `~/homebrew-tap/Casks/mdpreview.rb` (version + sha256 of DMG)

## Apple Signing
- Developer ID: "Developer ID Application: Takami Kazuihro (6RQMKB9NL7)"
- Notarization env vars in `.env` file: `APPLE_ID`, `TEAM_ID`, `APP_PASSWORD`
- Load with: `set -a && source .env && set +a`
- CI (GitHub Actions) secrets NOT configured - always falls back to ad-hoc signing
- Local signing is the reliable path for Developer ID releases

## Important Notes
- App Sandbox was removed (v1.2.9) - caused file access failures in signed builds
- `allowingReadAccessTo` uses `URL(fileURLWithPath: "/")` for full filesystem access
- Makefile `release` target has wrong order (signs after DMG creation) - do manual release instead
- Homebrew tap repo: `~/homebrew-tap/` (github: `kazu-42/homebrew-tap`)

content.text:
全て完了しました。リリースサマリー:

## v1.3.0 リリース完了

### 修正内容
1. **タブ間のスクロール位置共有バグ** (CRITICAL) — `contentID`でタブ切替を検知し、`preserveScroll`パラメータで制御
2. **テンプレートリロード時のisLoaded未リセット** — baseURL変更時にリセット
3. **大ファイル非同期読込のレースコンディション** — タブIDガード追加
4. **TOCがコードブロック内の見出しを誤検出** — fenced code block追跡

### リリース状態
- Developer ID署名済み (Takami Kazuihro / 6RQMKB9NL7)
- Apple Notarization完了 (Accepted + Stapled)
- ユニバーサルバイナリ (arm64 + x86_64)
- GitHub Release: https://github.com/kazu-42/mdpreview/releases/tag/v1.3.0
- Homebrew tap更新済み (`brew upgrade kazu-42/tap/mdpreview` で1.3.0へ更新確認)
- テスト全66件パス

### メモリ更新
`.env`にnotarization用環境変数があることを含め、プロジェクトのリリース手順をメモリに保存しました。
